name: Ancient Jewel Mine Gem Blast Quest
name_original: Ancient Jewel Mine Gem Blast Quest
description:
Be amazed and be dazzled..
And be mesmerized with awe..

hold on a little while, then...
Pop! Crush! and Blast those GEMS!!

Play and be fascinated with this jewel popping game!
This game is sooo easy to play, you don't even need an instruction!

So show your skills by popping them simultaneously and achieve unbelievable combos!!!

This will surely pop, crush and blast all your boredom's away!!

Just POP POP POP! and watch your score go UP UP UP!!
